casebody.data:
COMMON COUNCIL (Detroit) vs. PUBLIC LIGHTING COMMISSION, No. 14199, 101 M., 362.

(Certiorari to Wayne.)

To compel respondent to submit to the council for its. *1660approval or disapproval certain contracts entered into by tbe commission for the purchase of appliances necessary to the establishment of a public lighting plant.

The circuit judge denied the writ.

Reversed, and writ granted, July 5, 1894, without costs.
